CommandDefinition.Name: addwarehousereplacejob
CommandDefinition.Description: Creates a job that periodically replaces all data in one persistence layer with data from another.

Argument.Name: sourceConnectionType
Argument.Description: The ConnectionType from which the data is read

Argument.Name: targetConnectionType
Argument.Description: The ConnectionType to which the data is written

Argument.Name: tableName
Argument.Description: The table for which the data transfer will be performed

Argument.Name: interval
Argument.Description: The time interval (in seconds) after which the action is repeated periodically

Argument.Name: constraints
Argument.Description: Constraints for the set of objects to be copied, written in SQL

BoolOption.Name: c
BoolOption.Description: If there are constraints this parameter will lock the source data until it replaces the target
